#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	char bin[50];
	int T, i;

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		scanf("%s", bin);

		i = strlen(bin) - 1;

		while (bin[i] != '0')
		{
			if (i < 0)
				break;

			if (bin[i] == '1')
				bin[i] = '0';

			i--;
		}

		if (i < 0)
			printf("1");
		else
			bin[i] = '1';

		printf("%s\n", bin);
	}

	return 0;
}
